mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product WHERE category_code LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryCode}, '%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM product WHERE product.category_code LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryCode}, '%') ORDER BY pd_score DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM product WHERE product.category_code LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryCode}, '%') ORDER BY pd_score ASC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT pd_code, pd_name, manufacturer, pd_coo, material, pd_img, pd_mfd, pd_exp, pd_stock, pd_price, pd_score, category_code FROM ( SELECT p.*, FLOOR(SYSDATE - p.pd_mfd) AS date_diff FROM product p WHERE p.category_code LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryCode}, '%') ORDER BY date_diff ASC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT p.* FROM product p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pd_code, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM review GROUP BY pd_code ) r ON p.pd_code = r.pd_code ORDER BY r.review_count DESC NULLS LAST
